title: MCPAgentBench: A Real-world Task Benchmark for Evaluating LLM Agent MCP Tool Use
summary: Large Language Models (LLMs) are increasingly serving as autonomous agents, and their utilization of external tools via the Model Context Protocol (MCP) is considered a future trend. Current MCP evaluation sets suffer from issues such as reliance on external MCP services and a lack of difficulty awareness.
